14.m: And he awoke and rebuked the wind and said to the sea, “Peace! Be still!” And the wind ceased, and there was a great calm. - Mark 4:39 (ESV)

l.q: What hour of the day was it when Jesus and his disciples went into the boat?
What happened while they were in the boat?
What were the disciples' reaction to the windstorm?
What was Jesus able to do?
l.a: He commanded the wind to be still. The wind ceased, and there was a great calm.

s.h:
Loving Father, Christ our Brother,
Let Your light upon us shine;

14.a: Enjoy a cup of warm chocolate or apple cider with someone who lives with you.
